typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Name as string,
		CurrencyCode as string,
		Company as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> StageDimCompany
source(output(
		CompanyKey as long,
		CurrencyCode as string,
		Name as string,
		Company as string,
		DW_Id as long,
		DW_Batch as long,
		DW_SourceCode as string,
		DW_TimeStamp as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> DWDimCompany
StageDimCompany alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow
AlterRow sink(input(
		CompanyKey as long,
		CurrencyCode as string,
		Name as string,
		Company as string,
		DW_Id as long,
		DW_Batch as long,
		DW_SourceCode as string,
		DW_TimeStamp as binary
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['Company'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		CurrencyCode,
		Name,
		Company
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DimCompany
